    Interface Description

    This class must be used before any EGL function is called.

    EGLGetBlobFuncANDROID
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the ANDROIDBlobCache.eglSetBlobCacheFuncsANDROID(long, org.lwjgl.egl.EGLSetBlobFuncANDROID, org.lwjgl.egl.EGLGetBlobFuncANDROID) method.
    EGLSetBlobFuncANDROID
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the ANDROIDBlobCache.eglSetBlobCacheFuncsANDROID(long, org.lwjgl.egl.EGLSetBlobFuncANDROID, org.lwjgl.egl.EGLGetBlobFuncANDROID) method.
